allocateWorkingCapital(uint256).details: Allocate funds to working capital reserve (only manager)

getCashFlowFromAssets().details: Calculate total cash flow from assets Formula: Distributable Cash Flow + Change in Fixed Assets + Change in Working Capital

getCurrentPeriod().details: Get current period from rent vault

getDistributableCashFlow().details: Calculate distributable cash flow Formula: Rent Collected - Operating Expenses - Working Capital Reserve + DeFi Yield Note: CapEx is excluded from distributable yield

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recordCapEx(uint256,uint256).details: Record CapEx from an approved DAO proposal (only DAO)

releaseWorkingCapital(uint256).details: Release funds from working capital reserve (only manager)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetPeriod().details: Reset accounting for a new period (typically monthly) Resets rent collected, operating expenses, and working capital changes Note: This requires the rentVault owner to call resetPeriod on the vault

setManager(address).details: Set the manager address (can record operating expenses)

setYieldStackingManager(address).details: Set the yield stacking manager address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
